name: Arizona
title: 'Noncompliant' schools in rural Arizona hit with budget cuts
description: The Arizona State Board of Education voted to cut 3% of state funding to two rural school districts, Window Rock and Globe Unified, on Monday, citing noncompliance based on a state Auditor General’s report.

name: Education Funding
title: Rep. Nancy Mace Helps Secure Over $400 Million In Federal Grants For South Carolina
description: CHARLESTON, S.C. (Dec. 8, 2025) — Congresswoman Nancy Mace (R-SC-01) today announced she has helped local governments, nonprofits, small businesses, and organizations secure over $400 million in federal grants since the start of 2024. These competitive awards span infrastructure, public safety, education, veterans, and economic and workforce development across South Carolina’s 1st Congressional District.

name: Education Funding
title: Sullivan schools to lose almost $400K in federal title, special ed funding
description: BLOUNTVILLE — Although the final numbers for the new fiscal year are still to be tweaked, Sullivan County's school budget for 2017-18 will be nearly $400,000 shorter overall on federal title and special education funds than in 2016-17, money that in most cases benefited low-income children.
